user_stories.title: Implement BlogHero component
user_stories.description: Create the hero section for the blog page with title, subtitle, and decorative elements matching the site's glassmorphism theme
acceptance_criteria: Uses next-intl useTranslations hook for i18n
Matches glassmorphism dark theme from globals.css
Includes decorative accent elements consistent with Hero.tsx style

user_stories.title: Implement BlogCard component
user_stories.description: Create a reusable blog post card component showing thumbnail, title, excerpt, author, date, and category
acceptance_criteria: Props interface defined for: title, excerpt, thumbnail, author, date, category, slug
Glassmorphism card styling with hover effects
Link wraps entire card for accessibility

user_stories.title: Implement BlogFilters component
user_stories.description: Create filter/search controls for the blog including category filter chips and search input
acceptance_criteria: Category filter chips with active state styling
Props for categories array and filter callbacks

user_stories.title: Implement BlogGrid component
user_stories.description: Create the main grid layout that displays BlogCards with proper spacing and responsive columns
acceptance_criteria: Responsive grid: 1 col mobile, 2 cols tablet, 3 cols desktop
Accepts array of blog posts as props

user_stories.title: Create blog page route and layout
user_stories.description: Set up the blog page at app/[locale]/blog/page.tsx with proper layout structure combining all blog components
acceptance_criteria: Imports and renders BlogHero, BlogFilters, BlogGrid
Mock data for initial blog posts
Proper TypeScript types for blog post data

user_stories.title: Add blog filter state management
user_stories.description: Implement client-side filtering logic connecting BlogFilters to BlogGrid
acceptance_criteria: useState hooks for active category and search query
Filter logic filters posts by category
Search filters by title and excerpt
URL params sync for shareable filtered views (optional)

user_stories.title: Add i18n translations for blog
user_stories.description: Add English and Hebrew translations for all blog section text content
acceptance_criteria: Translations for: hero title, hero subtitle, filter labels, empty state, loading state

user_stories.title: Add blog link to navigation
user_stories.description: Update the site navigation to include a link to the blog section
acceptance_criteria: Translation keys added for nav item
Blog link styled consistently with other nav items

user_stories.title: Final integration and testing
user_stories.description: Verify all components work together, fix any styling issues, ensure responsive design works
acceptance_criteria: Navigation to blog works from main site
Both EN and HE locales work
